mapper.select:
SELECT cce.ID, cce.CAR_TYPE, cce.CAR_BRANDS, cce.STEEL_FRAME_NUMBER, cce.MOTOR_NUMBER, cce.CAR_NUMBER, cce.USER, cce.USE_DEPT_NAME, cce.CAR_ALLOTMENT_DATE, cce.BATTERY_NUMBER, cce.BATTERY_REPLACEMENT_DATE1, cce.BATTERY_REPLACEMENT_DATE2, cce.IF_LICENSE, cce.STORAGE_LOCATION, cce.STATUS, cce.IF_THREE, cce.CREATE_TIME, cce.MODIFY_TIME FROM cy_car_electric AS cce WHERE cce.DELETED=0
AND cce.IF_THREE = #{carElectric.ifThree}
AND cce.USE_DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carElectric.useDeptName},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(cce.STATUS, #{carElectric.status})
AND cce.IF_LICENSE = #{carElectric.ifLicense}
AND cce.USER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carElectric.user},'%')
AND cce.CAR_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carElectric.carNumber},'%')
AND cce.CAR_BRANDS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carElectric.carBrands},'%')
AND cce.CAR_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carElectric.carType},'%')
